org.nd4j.linalg.schedule

Class RampSchedule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.schedule.RampSchedule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, ISchedule

    public class RampSchedule
extends Object
implements ISchedule
    A "Wrapper" schedule that ramps up from 1/numIter * baseLR to baseLR over numIter iterations. The base learning rate is determined by the underlying ISchedule, as a function of time. This can be used to provide a slow start, for use cases such as transfer learning.
    Author:
    Alex Black
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
